meanings.definition: In a direction towards a lower place or position.
meanings.sent1: She looked downwards to find her lost toy.
meanings.sent2: The ball rolled downwards the hill.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to climb upwards but kept slipping downwards.
meanings.sent4: His mood spiraled downwards as the day went on.
meanings.sent5: The water flowed downwards, creating a soothing sound.

meanings.definition: Moving or facing towards a lower place or position.
meanings.sent1: The downwards motion of the elevator was smooth.
meanings.sent2: The downwards slope made skiing easy.
meanings.sent3: The downwards trend in sales worried the manager.
meanings.sent4: Her downwards glance revealed her disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The downwards arrow on the sign pointed the way to the basement.
